item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @Officer-Ahole Officer-Ahole
item.description:
@Officer-Ahole wrote:

Newty:

Tell your users to quit spamming the forums. If it doesn’t stop then your advertising abilities here will be permanently removed.

Newty:

Since you don’t need this site for advertising you wouldn’t mind this thread being locked and wiped then? As well as your server name added to the censor list? Post back here if you still don’t care.

= Attitude.

Trollmuch doesn’t have complete control over what his users does - It’s not his fault. Newty wouldn’t have gotten attitude back from Trollmuch if Newty simply asked him to tell his players not to do it anymore, but instead he threatened him. AGAIN, Newty needs to learn how to cool it with his superinternetmodpowers, and just talk to the guy - You’ll get much further that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @z21 z2
item.description:
@z21 wrote:

[quote=“Officer-Ahole, post:272, topic:296392”][quote author=z2 link=topic=392415.msg3147004#msg3147004 date=1268170814]
Which is most likely why he only got a warning? Thats why the guy told him if it happens again then he will have to take action.
[/quote]

Trollmuch didn’t like newty’s attitude, which is why Trollmuch responded the way he did. It all goes back to newty’s ego argument, he needs to learn to cool it.[/quote]
Read the last 2 pages of this thread, where the fuck is the attitude? If a server thats being advertised is causing issues throughout the forum, the best way to handle it is get rid of the server from this forum. Thats what newty said would happen if the spam didnt stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @Officer-Ahole Officer-Ahole
item.description:
@Officer-Ahole wrote:

[quote=“z2, post:269, topic:296392”][quote author=Officer-Ahole link=topic=392415.msg3146927#msg3146927 date=1268166887]

I have 3 users who play my game tops, this mopar shitty forum is all about ego based people. I dont care about mopar as an advertisement forum i come here for the lol’s

But have fun boosting your ego mr mod.

Since you don’t need this site for advertising you wouldn’t mind this thread being locked and wiped then? As well as your server name added to the censor list? Post back here if you still don’t care.

sorry your highness let me rephrase

Fuck You.

@newty, i hope you didn’t think he would back down to your threats? if so, you’re an idiot - you’re going about this the wrong way. forcing your power on him wont do anything at all, especially over some forum. you really do need to cut your ego down to size.

Using his power to enforce rules of the forum has what to do with ego?

Being offended by saying “I don’t need mopar” is not enforcing any rules - What are you talking about?
[/quote]
His members were spamming the forums saying join king-pk.[/quote]

Which was out of his hands.

Read full topic
